meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by squiggles
meanings.sent1: The squiggly pattern on the wallpaper was colorful.
meanings.sent2: Her handwriting was messy and squiggly.
meanings.sent3: The squiggly road sign made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The squiggly branches of the tree reached out like fingers.
meanings.sent5: The squiggly design on the dress caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: He drew a squiggly on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The map had many squiggly lines representing rivers.
meanings.sent3: The squiggly in the sand looked like a snake.
meanings.sent4: The artist used a squiggly to add movement to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The child's drawing was full of colorful squigglies.
